column4: a lot of the bugs can only be fixed upstream, but the bug reports are forwarded upstream
Many bugs are not upstream. Or if they are (e.g. I'm maintaining Speex), the update won't ever make it despite the patch being submitted *before* the release of Dapper!
you did read the mention of #ubuntu-offtopic ?
Yes, but I believe fixing bugs should be considered "on topic". Or did I miss something?
